137 class CStorage // Naming: csto
138 {
139  public:

144 
148  ~CStorage();

157  void Open(const char *fName);
158 
162  void Close();
163 
182  void Create(const char *fName, int pageSize, int userHeaderSize,
183  int cacheNPages = 100);
184 
188  bool IsOpened(){
189  return (fd >= 0);
190  }//end IsOpened
191 
196  void Drop();
197 
202  long GetFileSize(){
203  return lseek(fd, 0, SEEK_END);
204  }//end GetFileSize
205

207  * Reads user header.
208  *
209  * @warning This operation don't use the cache.
210  */

216  long GetUserHeaderSize();

246  long InsertNewPage(void *page);
247 
253  void FreePage(long pageId);
254 
258  void FlushCache(){
259  cache.FlushCache();
260  }//end FlushCache
261 
265  int GetCacheTotalPages(){
266  return fileHeader.cacheTotalPages;
267  }//end GetCacheTotalPages
268 
275  void ResizeCache(int newCacheNPages);
276 
280  int GetPageSize(){
281  return fileHeader.pageSize;
282  }//end GetPageSize
283 
287  long GetTotalPagesInUse(){
288  return fileHeader.totalPagesInUse;
289  }//end GetTotalPagesInUse
290 
294  long GetTotalPagesIncludingDisposed(){
295  return fileHeader.totalPagesInUse + fileHeader.totalPagesInDisposeList;
296  }//end GetTotalPagesIncludingDisposed
297 
298  //---------------------------------------------
299  // Statistics Related - When activated.
300  //---------------------------------------------
301  #ifdef CSTORAGE_STATISTICS
302 
306  struct statisticsCounters {
307 
311  long headerRead;
312 
316  long headerWrite;
317 
321  long pageRead;
322 
326  long pageWrite;
327 
331  long newPage;
332 
336  long totalPageAccess; //
337 
346  long diskRead;
347 
356  long diskWrite;
357  };
358 
362  statisticsCounters counters;
363 
367  statisticsCounters & GetStatistics() {
368  counters.totalPageAccess = counters.pageRead + counters.pageWrite;
369 
370  return counters;
371  }//end GetStatistics
372 
376  void ResetStatistics() {
377  counters.headerRead =
378  counters.headerWrite =
379  counters.pageRead =
380  counters.pageWrite =
381  counters.newPage =
382  counters.totalPageAccess =
383  counters.diskRead =
384  counters.diskWrite = 0;
385  }//end ResetStatistics
386  #endif
387 
388  private:
389  //---------------------------------------------
390  // Constants and types.
391  //---------------------------------------------
392  #define FROT 4 // 16 records per block - cache attribute
393 
394  struct tFileHeader {
395  int pageSize; // size of each page - defined in creation time
396  int cacheTotalPages; // number of pages in cache
397  long totalPagesInUse; // total number of valid pages
398  long disposeList; // lists of the disposed records
399  long totalPagesInDisposeList; // total number of disposed pages
400  long userHeaderSize; // size of the user's header
401  };//end tFileHeader
402  #define CSTORAGE_HEADERSIZE sizeof(tFileHeader)
403 
407  char fileName[CSTORAGE_MAX_FNAME_LENGTH];
408 
412  int fd;
413 
417  tFileHeader fileHeader;
418 
422  long firstPageDiskAddress;
423 
427  CNSCache<CStorage> cache;
428 
429  friend class CNSCache<CStorage>;
430 
434  void ReadHeader(){
435  lseek(fd, 0, SEEK_SET);
436  read(fd, &fileHeader, CSTORAGE_HEADERSIZE);
437  }//end ReadHeader
438 
442  void WriteHeader(){
443  lseek(fd, 0, SEEK_SET);
444  write(fd, &fileHeader, CSTORAGE_HEADERSIZE);
445  }//end WriteHeader
446 
451  void CalcFirstPageDiskAddress();
452 
458  long ToPageId(long fileCursor){
459  return ((fileCursor - firstPageDiskAddress) / fileHeader.pageSize);
460  }//end ToPageId
461 
467  long ToFileCursor(long pageId){
468  return (firstPageDiskAddress + (pageId * fileHeader.pageSize));
469  }//end ToFileCursor
470 
474  void InitializeCache(){
475  cache.MountCache(this, GetTotalPagesIncludingDisposed(),
476  FROT, fileHeader.cacheTotalPages, fileHeader.pageSize);
477  }//end InitializeCache
478 
485  void DiskReadPage(long pageId, void *page);
486 
493  void DiskWritePage(long pageId, void *page);
494 
498  void Reset();
499 
500 };//end CStorage
